video.title: Heidi
video.synopsis: A plucky young orphan sent to live with her grandfather in the mountains discovers wonder and adventure around every corner.

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Dete takes Heidi up to the mountains to meet her grandfather. Along the way, Heidi hears stories about him and begins to worry.
episodes.title: Up to the Mountain

episodes.synopsis: Grandfather sends Heidi out to the meadow with Peter, his "Goat General." The two don't get along, but when trouble strikes, they form a bond.
episodes.title: First Day in the Mountains

episodes.synopsis: When Karl and his gang capture Heidi, Peter challenges the bully to a dangerous climb. But things don't go quite as planned.
episodes.title: The Challenge

episodes.synopsis: Heidi goes searching for a plant that will help her save a wounded bird, and stumbles across Peter's secret hiding place in the woods.
episodes.title: Save Chippy

episodes.synopsis: In the village, Heidi hears Karl plotting to find and attack Peter's tree house. She rushes to warn her friend, and together they make a plan.
episodes.title: The Treehouse Oath

episodes.synopsis: Worried that Grandfather is going to send her to school, Heidi runs away. Meanwhile Grandfather gets a surprising letter from Aunt Dete.
episodes.title: A Night Out

episodes.synopsis: After Theresa tricks Heidi into "buying" bread that belongs to someone else, Heidi must prove to the town that she isn't a thief.
episodes.title: For a Loaf of Bread

episodes.synopsis: Karl and Theresa chase Heidi and Peter to Grandfather's old house in the village. The girls end up trapped in the attic, where no one can hear them.
episodes.title: Trapped in the Manor

episodes.synopsis: Villagers set out to hunt a wolf that threatened one of their goats. Meanwhile, Heidi is alone in the woods, where she finds a young wolf cub.
episodes.title: Beware of the Wolf

episodes.synopsis: As spring returns, Peter discovers the treasure he kept hidden in the shed has vanished. He and Heidi set a trap for the thieves.
episodes.title: Peter´s Treasure

episodes.synopsis: After Karl and Theresa invade the treehouse, Heidi and Peter can't agree on what to do. Heidi turns to Grandfather for help.
episodes.title: Attack the Treehouse!

episodes.synopsis: Heidi and Theresa decide to put their differences aside as they race to save one of the goats.
episodes.title: Save Sweetheart

episodes.synopsis: Heidi is finally ready to become a "Goat General"! But her excitement fades when Aunt Dete arrives to take her back to the city.
episodes.title: The End of Spring

episodes.synopsis: In the city, Heidi is sent to help Clara, a young girl in a wheelchair. First she must get past the girl's stern governess, Miss Rottenmeier.
episodes.title: Clara

episodes.synopsis: Longing for a glimpse of the mountains, Heidi sneaks out to the cathedral bell tower. But she'll need help to escape Miss Rottenmeier's suspicions.
episodes.title: The Bell Tower

episodes.synopsis: When Miss Rottenmeier punishes Heidi for sneaking kittens into the house, Clara must find a way to save the cats from a terrible fate.
episodes.title: The Promise

episodes.synopsis: The girls are eager to show Clara's father how much she has improved with Heidi's help. But an accident gets Heidi in trouble with the family.
episodes.title: Papa Returns

episodes.synopsis: Back from summer break, Clara's teacher discovers that Heidi doesn't know how to read or write. Clara tries to help so they can have lessons together.
episodes.title: Home Schooled

episodes.synopsis: Clara's grandmother, a former actress, swoops in and decides to put on a play with the girls. Heidi begins to get excited about reading.
episodes.title: Let’s Make a Show

episodes.synopsis: Grandmamma takes the girls to the park, where they meet a new friend. But Clara grows jealous when Heidi and Rudy start running after butterflies.
episodes.title: At the Park

episodes.synopsis: Worried that Clara has given up on walking, Heidi and Grandmamma try everything to cheer her up. Clara starts training in secret to surprise them.
episodes.title: Clara Stands

episodes.synopsis: While Miss Rottenmeier is out of town, Heidi and Clara bring home a sick baby goat. Meanwhile, the butler has a surprise for Aunt Dete.
episodes.title: Goats in the City

episodes.synopsis: When the goat drives Miss Rottenmeier to quit in a huff, Clara is very upset. Heidi decides there's only one way to get the governess to stay.
episodes.title: The Resignation

episodes.synopsis: Now that Clara can stand, Heidi assumes she'll be going back to the mountains. But she learns Clara's father has a different plan for her.
episodes.title: A Tree for Shelter

episodes.synopsis: As summer arrives, Heidi misses the mountains more than ever. Meanwhile, Miss Rottenmeier and Clara's father investigate strange sounds in the night.
episodes.title: The Ghost

episodes.synopsis: Heidi is upset when Grandfather doesn't reply to her letter. She soon learns her letter was never sent -- and someone in the house still has it.
episodes.title: The Letter

episodes.synopsis: Heidi says goodbye to Clara and returns to the mountains at last. But Grandfather didn't get her message, and is packing his bags to leave.
episodes.title: Back to Dörfli

episodes.synopsis: Heidi steps in as Goat General while Peter rushes off to help a trapped Karl. Her skills are put to the test when Peter's goat gives birth.
episodes.title: A New Goat in the Herd

episodes.synopsis: Heidi and Grandfather move to the Manor so she can go to school. Theresa's family is not happy to see them, but Theresa needs Grandfather's help.
episodes.title: The Broken Statue

episodes.synopsis: Peter can't afford the medicine his grandmother needs, so Heidi pays for it with a family heirloom. But a winter storm creates a new problem.
episodes.title: The Brooch

episodes.synopsis: The day of an important test at school, Peter finds someone has opened the gate to let all his goats out. He has to make a difficult choice.
episodes.title: School Test

episodes.synopsis: Before moving to another village, Karl holds a scavenger hunt to give away his fossil collection. Heidi realizes why Theresa is so desperate to win.
episodes.title: Scavenger Hunt

episodes.synopsis: Clara arrives to visit Heidi, but Miss Rottenmeier refuses to let her stay in the cabin. The girls hatch a risky plan to change her mind.
episodes.title: Goats Hour

episodes.synopsis: Miss Rottenmeier sets out to find the girls in the mountains but loses her way as a big storm moves in.
episodes.title: The Storm

episodes.synopsis: As Grandfather tries to finish building a bridge he started long ago, he's haunted by nightmares. Heidi and Clara try to piece together what happened.
episodes.title: The Devil’s Bridge

episodes.synopsis: Miss Rottenmeier is startled to see a face from her past in the village. When the man starts working for Grandfather, she threatens to leave.
episodes.title: Friedrich

episodes.synopsis: Jealous of the time Heidi is spending with Clara, Peter steals Clara's wheelchair. The friends have a terrible fight -- which leads to a surprise.
episodes.title: The Wheelchair

episodes.synopsis: When Clara's father and Grandmamma come to visit, Peter fears they're after him and runs away. Heidi tries to convince him to come back.
episodes.title: Forgiven

episodes.synopsis: As the village celebrates the completion of Grandfather's bridge, Heidi and Clara plan a picnic. But will family tensions ruin the fun?
episodes.title: Edelweiss
